short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize Youtube video transcripts using AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube VideoSynth is a practical tool designed to simplify your YouTube experience! 
It summarizes YouTube videos in any language, offering a straightforward and efficient way to navigate YouTube content. 
It uses LLMs models like GPT and Claude, all for freeâ€”simply create a free account for GPT and Claude. 

Perfect for those seeking a quick understanding of video content and quick answers to clickbait titles.

- Simple UI
- Summaries organized in chapters and bullet points
- Move video cursor by clicking on the bullet points
- Keyboard shortcuts to open/close side panel
- Choose summary language
- Choose summary length
- Compatible with GPT3.5 and Claude (additional models will be added over time)
- Completely free! Donations are welcomed and they will all be used to fund charity work.


Upgrades:
v1.1:
- Fixed 'Something went wrong' issue when using ChatGPT, caused by a backend change from OpenAI.
